cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.FL, cs.DS, cs.SC. 

This paper deals with the analysis of simple linear loops, which are commonly studied in programming languages and formal verification. The paper discusses algorithms for computing non-termination sets, which is a topic that falls under the sub-category of program analysis (cs.PL). Additionally, the paper involves the study of loop guards and program variables, which are topics that are relevant to the sub-categories of logic in computer science (cs.LO), formal languages and automata theory (cs.FL), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and symbolic computation (cs.SC).
